name: Breakout Acres Minigolf
description:
Created for GMAP231 Scripting for Game Design

* Notice * Game is unoptimized due to an oversight and may have reduced framerates

Attributions:

Models:

- Minigolf Green, Ball, Club, Flag: Kenney • Minigolf Kit

- Environment: Kenney • Nature Kit

- Crates: Kenney • Platformer Kit

Fonts:

- All Text: Kingthings Clarity Font - 1001 Free Fonts

Sprites:

- Crack: 20 Crack (PNG Transparent) | OnlyGFX.com

Audio:

- Crate Destruction: Freesound - pack: Crate Breaking by kevinkace

- Club Swing: Freesound - zolopher (Used Several Golf#.wav)

- Pretty Much Every Other Impact Sound + Coin Pickup: Kenney • Impact Sounds

- Multi-Ball Powerup: Freesound - "Coin Pickup.mp3" by Phenala

- Crowd Clap: Freesound - "Crowd Clapping 1_1" by Joao_Janz

- Crowd Aww: Download crowd-groan Sound Effects Page 1 (freesoundeffects.com)

- Score Card Hover: Freesound - "Toss.ogg" by egomassive

- Score Card Zoom: Freesound - "fh_Paper_Swipe_Surface2_Short_01.wav" by Frank1100

- Title Music: Freesound - "Childish Theme Loop 2.wav" by Mrthenoronha

- Birds + Nature Ambience: Freesound - "Early summer, czech wood outside the camp, early morning ambiance" by J.Zazvurek
